Ina Love, onye amụrụ Wilhelmina McKechnie (1928 - 5 Ọktoba 2004), bụ onye otu ọrụ aka na Scotland.

Amụrụ na Blackhill, Glasgow, McKechnie rụrụ ọrụ na-ere anụ n'ahịa site na afọ iri na anọ, mgbe ahụ afọ abụọ gachara ghọrọ onye telephonist na Post Office, sonyere Union of Post Office Workers.   Ọ nọrọ afọ anọ na Women's Royal Army Corps, ma rụọkwa ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese telefon na ọdụ ndị uwe ojii Springburn, ebe ọ zutere ma lụọ Jimmy Love
Ọ mụrụ ụmụ atọ, ezinụlọ ya kwagakwara Canada na 1960, ma ịkwaga ahụ emeghị nke ọma, Ina na ụmụ ya laghachiri Scotland afọ atọ ka e mesịrị..

Mgbe ọ lọghachiri, Lovehụnanya ghọrọ onye telephonist na ụlọ ọgwụ Stobhill dị na Glasgow, n'oge na-adịghị anya ewelitere ịbụ onye isi telephonist.  O sonyeere National Union of Public Employees (NUPE) wee jiri nke nta nke nta wee bụrụ onye a ma ama na otu, wee bụrụ onye nlekọta na 1968, wee bụrụ onye isi oche ntọala nke NUPE's Scottish Divisional Council na 1976
Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, a họpụtara ya ịbụ onye isi oche nke otu ahụ
Council, na ọ bụụrụ onye isi otu n'afọ 1988/89
Ọ chịkwara kọmitii na-ahụ maka iwu n'otu..
Ịhụnanya nọchitere anya NUPE na General Council nke Trades Union Congress
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na onye isi nke Scottish Labour Party, bụ nke ọ rụrụ ụka nke ọma maka iwebata ụgwọ opekempe, yana na Labour Middle East Council, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji mee ka ndị Palestine mara
